features: With Wine Wash, you can get TIPSY, but now your wine glasses don’t have to!
SAFE TO USE: Made of BPA-FREE and Food Safe silicone, so you can feel comfortable using these in your home.

NO MORE BROKEN GLASSES: Wine Wash helps keep your wine glasses from tipping over and breaking in the dishwasher, even your tall and delicate stemware like champagne flutes and large red wine glasses. When used properly, these actually work and SAVE YOU TIME. Compatible with most wine glasses in most dishwashers. We've tested hundreds of combinations. Clips are 3" in length.

PERFECT GIFT FOR WINE LOVERS: Four (4) Wine Wash attachments are neatly packaged in a fancy little box. Pair with a bottle of wine to make a great gift for a host, hostess, mom, book club, housewarming, stocking stuffers, holiday gifts and more!
SUPPORT SMALL BUSINESS: The cost of one (1) pack is comparable to ordering one glass of wine, plus you’re supporting a small, WOMAN-OWNED business!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why You Need Wine Wash in Your Kitchen Easy to use. One side attaches to your dishwasher rack and the other to your wine glass stem. You can move them around as needed or leave them clipped in place between cycles. Saves you time. Less time handwashing, more time for the important stuff, like more wine! Each box includes four (4) clips, so you can wash more glasses in less time. BPA Free & non-toxic. Wine Wash dishwasher attachments are BPA Free, so you can feel comfortable using them in your home. Fits glasses of various sizes. They’re compatible with most wine glasses in most dishwashers, including tall red wine glasses, champagne flutes and coupe glasses.

How to Use Wine Wash Troubleshooting Tips to Prevent Your Glasses From Getting Tipsy Pro tip 1: Every dishwasher and wine glass combination is different. The trick is finding the "sweet spot" in your dishwasher, for your particular stemware. Try different spots along the edge of the top and bottom rack (the top rack is adjustable in many dishwashers if you're glasses are too tall). Pro tip 2: Check to make sure your wine glasses are dishwasher safe (don't worry, most are). Pro tip 3: Before you run your first cycle with Wine Wash, close the dishwasher door and re-open to ensure that a protrusion in the door or side wall is not pushing the clip off of the rack. If everything looks good, wash away! Pro tip 4: Once you've identified that sweet spot, for convenience, you can leave Wine Wash attachments clipped in between cycles.

Hi, I'm Erica, founder of Wine Wash Co. When the pandemic hit, I was enjoying more wine at home, but got tired of hand washing all of my wine glasses. Though my stemware was dishwasher safe, I was afraid it would tip over and break in the dishwasher. And a really nice glass of wine just tastes better in a glass with a stem (sorry stemless), so I took matters into my own hands. Countless designs, prototypes and bottles of wine later, Wine Wash was born. A simple gadget that lets you safely wash your wine glasses in the dishwasher. My hope is that it makes your life a little easier - less time hand washing, more time for the important stuff. In addition to our flagship Wine Wash, I’ve created some really fun cleaning accessories and gifts for the tidy wine lover. Let’s make choring less boring! Thank you for supporting my small, woman-owned business. Cheers! Erica

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: Had a hard time finding wine glass holders for my dishwasher. My previous dishwasher had built in holders but my current dishwasher does not. I got tired of having wine glasses break during dish washing cycles. These holders are sturdy and fit the bill for standard glasses. They can fold up when not in use. I would not use them for expensive Waterford crystal wine glasses but they are perfect for everyday glasses. A must have for wine drinkers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solved my problem well
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought wine glasses on Amazon. I first made very careful measurements of my dishwasher to make sure that they would fit on the top rack. Once I received the wine glasses I found that because of their shape they could only stand stable on the top rack in a way that caused the wine glass base to rub against the dishwasher wall, which caused the glasses to lean sideways when pulling out or pushing in the rack. I ordered the Wine Wash glass holders to hopefully solve this problem. They worked very well. They were easy to attach to both the wine glasses and the dishwasher rack. The wine glasses stayed secure through the wash and were easy to remove from the Wine Wash holders when I removed them from the dishwasher. Overall I would say they are a very good product and I’m glad that I bought them but their cost seems a bit high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally!! Stemware is saved
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy these are to use! I do think it’s important to read the directions and ensure they have been secured correctly. Once doing so, my glasses were easy to attach and are dishwasher safe and secure! I also love their fun sponges with catchy wine phrases and dish gloves - all great gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Performs as expected
reviews.reviewText: I recently had to replace a dishwasher that had a built-in wine glass rack extension. As the removeable rack didn't work in the new machine I purchased these holders. They are adequate and serve the purpose sufficiently. Easy to install and position, they can be moved around in the machine to accommodation grid configuration. Once attached to the wine glass stem, there is enough tilt to drain water from the inverted foot of the glass. Four stars as durability is yet uncertain. Also, the idea of supporting a small independent business is appealing! Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for long stem wine glasses…
reviews.reviewText: Purchased both this product and the silicon type. This one wins! Holds glasses firmly in place, while the silicon type allow wine glasses to move. In saying this, these can only be used in a standard dishwasher lower rack (my wine glasses too tall for upper). I’m buying another set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Only work with short wine glasses.
reviews.reviewText: The product is okay. However, it won't work any wine glass with long stems or with larger wine capacity because the holders are short and the sides of the dishwasher are too low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only fit about 50% of my wine glasses
reviews.reviewText: My new dishwasher does not have the kind of racks that accommodate stemware so I thought these would solve that problem. Only work for about 50% of the kinds of wine glasses that I have. First of all if the glass is a very large diameter, it will not work because the clip is too short. On some glasses, the bowl of the glass extends too far down the stem so that the stem is lower than the 4 1/2 inch height of the side of the rack that it would need to attach to. Ok if you're lucky enough to have glasses that fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use and effective
reviews.reviewText: These clips are easy to attach to the glass stem and the dishwasher rack, as long as you do it carefully. They seem to hold the glasses in place very effectively. I am thrilled with these.
These are fantastic, no more tippy wine glasses in the dishwasher!
Seem to work well. Time will tell if they loosen up and need to be replaced.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great fit for a modern dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. Works much better than some of other attachments we tried. Seems that the dishwasher's manufacturers decision to drop this option from a lot of their current models turned into a profitable opportunity for someone else.
they will hold the stem glasses in the dishwasher but are really tight to put the glass stem in the clip. I am always afraid of braking it and cut my fingers. Bottom line - they work
